ygData.subject: Re: Guide to Wizardry
ygData.msgSnippet: And I always have Gate handy. So much better than Fade and Shadowstep! Saved my life yesterday in the dervish camp. Shannyn, 12 Tunare server Back before I got
ygData.messageBody:
And I always have Gate handy. So much better than Fade and Shadowstep! Saved
my life yesterday in the dervish camp.

Shannyn, 12 Tunare server


Back before I got my j boots. my preffered method of escape was shadow step
shadow step then gate. SS casts muxh faster than gate so I would use it to
try and get far enough away to gate. When I was hunting in N. Rho, It
would sometimes put me almost half a zone from th MOB trying to kill me. In
oasis it usually put me in the water for somereason if I was on the beach.
then I'd gate while under water. Now I just run really fast with the
journeymans boots
